KT element: KtClass
FIR element: FirRegularClassImpl
FIR source kind: KtRealSourceElementKind

FIR element rendered:
public? final? [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] class X : R|kotlin/Any| {
    public? [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] [ContainingClassKey=X] constructor(): R|Y.X| {
        super<R|kotlin/Any|>()
    }

    public? final? [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] fun y(): String

}

FIR FILE:
FILE: [ResolvedTo(IMPORTS)] nestedClassScript.kts
    context(<script>@kotlin.script.templates.standard.ScriptTemplateWithArgs)
    SCRIPT: [ResolvedTo(BODY_RESOLVE)] 
        [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] lval args: R|kotlin/Array<kotlin/String>|

        public? final? [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] class Y : R|kotlin/Any| {
            public? [ResolvedTo(RAW_FIR)] [ContainingClassKey=Y] constructor(): R|Y| {
                super<R|kotlin/Any|>()
